_header: For love is love and ever shall be
Subjects: God, love of; carols, to Christ
_description: John Audelay, ‘De amore dei’, a carol — five 5-line stanzas (ababb) with refrain, ‘I say herefore’ and burden: ‘I haue a loue is heuen kyng / I loue his loue fore euermor’

BodDou302.First Lines:
ffore loue is loue & euer schal be & loue has bene ore we
                    were bore…
BodDou302.Last Lines: …With is loue trew loue is nonI say here fore
